entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
